name: SafariTV
0:
”Alexa, Play Safari TV”
”Alexa, Start Safari TV”
”Alexa, Open Safari TV”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: safari t. v.
des:
Safari TV is an Indian Television Channel broadcasting in Malayalam language. It is an exploration channel based in Kottayam, Kerala. The channel is part of Safari Multimedia Pvt.Ltd,

Safari brings the diversity of the global expanse to the visiting room of every Malayalee. This is the first exploration channel in India.Safari presents diverse programmes that provide entertainment and knowledge alike. World travels, Indian travels, numerous other journeys, history, geography, culture, art and adventure- all come before the viewers through this. The curiosity to know ‘what is beyond that’ is the real motive of all the explorations of mankind. The objective of Safari is to inspire each and every viewer to take up travels, both short and extensive, for experiencing and learning the world. Travels that take the viewer along... That is the ultimate objective of this channel.


The skill provides responses in English (US).

Invoke the skill by saying Alexa, open safari tv and the skill will start playing live tv.
To stop the skill please say, Alexa, stop and the skill will stop playing the tv.
To pause the skill please say, Alexa, pause and Alexa will pause the playback.

Alexa Streaming Powered by : Inmenzo Technologies LLP
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
